name: assess_assembly
description: Calculate accuracy statistics for an assembly.

options.description: reference, should be a fasta file. If correspondng minimap2 indices do not exist they will be created. (required).
set the minimap2 preset, e.g. map-ont, asm5, asm10, asm20 [default: map-ont].
chunk size. Input reads/contigs will be broken into chunks prior to alignment, 0 will not chunk (default 100000).
.bed file of reference regions to assess.
list all indels at least this long (default: 0, set to 0 to skip searching for indels).
use with -l option to create a .bed file to exclude indels. If the -b option is used, the two bed files will be combined.
accumulate the stats over a number of chunks, can include multiple values separated by comma, one summary file will be generated for each value [default: 10,100].
